charges.charge_description: Count 1: 21:841A=NP.F Possess with intent to distribute approx. 40 lbs of cocaine. Penalty: 10 yrs to life and/or $4 Mil; $100 cvf; 5 yrs max tsr.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE 168 mos to serve; consecutive to 18 mos to serve L-99-CR-1129; 5 yrs tsr; fine waived; drug treatment aftercare and treatment for mental health; $100 cvf; deft advised of right to appeal; deft remanded to custody. *07/12/17 - REVOKED: 5 months to serve; placed back on Supervised Release under the same terms and conditions as previously imposed by the Court and until its original expiration date of September 26, 2020; added condition to participate in a drug treatment for up to 90 days; shall participate in a domestic and mental health counseling; no excessive usage of alcohol; shall remain in U.S. Marshals custody until bed space is available; 14 days to appeal. Pled true to violation 1, court finds sufficient evidence that deft has violated srt as to the allegation, Revoked: Time served with curfew and EM; continue under the same terms and conditions as previously imposed with all original conditions until original expiration date; mental health, anger mgmt, and drug treatment on a monthly basis; any obligations from original sentence that have not been satisfied, remain active; advised of right to appeal
